name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Team Lead Backend Developer with 10+ years of experience in building scalable, high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Node.js**, **JavaScript**, and **ECMAScript 6**. Demonstrated expertise in designing RESTful APIs and implementing **WebSockets** for real-time data exchange. Proficient in utilizing **MySQL**, **Redis**, and **RabbitMQ** to develop microservices-based architectures and messaging systems that enhance system resilience and performance. Proven ability to lead technical teams, guiding the development of efficient, maintainable software while fostering a collaborative work environment. Strong organizational, diagnostic, and troubleshooting skills allow for effective project management and rapid issue resolution.

Adept in building cloud-native applications, with hands-on experience across the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Additionally, experienced in CI/CD automation and principles of Agile development. Passionate about integrating innovative technology that supports organizational growth and delivers substantial business impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented **scalable infrastructure** using **Node.js** and **JavaScript (ECMAScript 6)**, ensuring seamless integration with **REST** and **WebSockets** for real-time data processing in backend applications.
• Led the transition to **microservices** architecture, optimizing application performance and scalability while managing **Redis** for caching and **RabbitMQ** for messaging systems, resulting in a **30%** improvement in response time.
• Conducted technical leadership in diagnosing and troubleshooting complex application issues, leveraging **MySQL** for effective data management and analytics, while maintaining **99.9%** uptime across services.
• Established and maintained robust Git workflows for version control, ensuring code quality and collaboration across a team of developers.
• Developed and managed **scalable infrastructure** to support rapid application growth, resulting in a **50%** increase in concurrent user handling without performance degradation.
• Fostered organizational abilities by mentoring junior developers, promoting best practices in coding and design, which led to a **40%** reduction in onboarding time.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and implement diagnostic tools for tracking application health and performance metrics, achieving quicker fault resolution.

Led the development and modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability, maintainability, and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.

- Developed and deployed scalable microservices using **Node.js** to meet the architecture demands of over **100K** simultaneous transactions, ensuring efficient transaction handling.
- Utilized **JavaScript** and **ECMAScript 6** for coding dynamic, user-focused front-end applications, achieving a response time decrease of **30%** for user interactions on financial dashboards.
- Managed version control and collaboration through **Git**, implementing code reviews and technical leadership to guide a team of **9** developers.
- Integrated asynchronous messaging systems like **RabbitMQ** to support real-time communication across services, significantly increasing system responsiveness and reliability.
- Optimized database operations with **MySQL**, ensuring data integrity and reducing query times by **25%**, accommodating high transaction throughput.
- Designed asynchronous event processing frameworks leveraging **RabbitMQ** and **Redis** for efficient message handling within microservice architecture.
- Fostered a culture of organizational excellence and technical leadership, driving team performance, improving **diagnostic** and **troubleshooting skills** among team members.

Led the design and optimization of backend services for a global e-commerce platform utilizing **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **JavaScript** (ECMAScript 6) to ensure high availability, low latency, and scalability across critical modules such as checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Developed RESTful APIs and integrated **WebSockets** for real-time communication, enhancing order updates and dynamic inventory tracking to improve customer experience.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement **RabbitMQ** for efficient messaging solutions, ensuring responsive order processing and real-time customer support.
• Managed data storage strategies with **MySQL** and **Redis**, optimizing distributed data access to support over **100,000** concurrent users with minimal latency.
• Engineered a microservices architecture that facilitated seamless scalability and maintainability, improving deployment efficiency by **30%**.
• Provided technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement while honing diagnostic and troubleshooting skills.
• Utilized **Git** for version control and collaborative development, ensuring code quality and streamlined workflows within the team.
• Implemented scalable infrastructure solutions using **Microservices**, supporting a dynamic workflow that reduced system downtime by **40%** during peak traffic.
• Enhanced system resilience and performance through the application of caching strategies with **Redis**, successfully decreasing database read pressure and improving response times.
• Championed organizational best practices that aligned with project goals, enhancing team productivity and project deliverables.
• Spearheaded the integration of messaging systems to streamline inter-service communication and improve operational efficiency.
